title: Quick beef stir-fry with cabbage and coconut
description: If stir-fry is your midweek saviour, try this one-pan Asian wonder that combines steak with coconut and cabbage.
ingredients: Juice 2 limes, plus wedges to serve

method.Step 1: Heat a large frying pan or wok over a high heat with a splash of oil. When the pan is searing hot, fry the steaks for 2½ minutes on each side, then slice and set aside.

method.Step 2: Add more oil to the pan and fry the onion for 2 minutes, then add the cabbages and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add the lime juice, soy sauce, chilli sauce, half the coconut and half the coriander to the pan. Add the beef and any juices, then stir in the remaining coriander and sprinkle with the remaining coconut.

method.Step 3: Serve with lime wedges, the remaining coriander and a drizzle of sesame oil, if you like.
